parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Path and filename for the OLE object file

parameters.name: CreateLink
parameters.description: True to create an external link to the OLE object file, false to embed the OLE object on the document

parameters.name: Aspect
parameters.description: Viewing aspect of the object as defined in the DVASPECT enumeration (see Remarks )

parameters.name: XPos
parameters.description: x coordinate for the OLE object

parameters.name: YPos
parameters.description: y coordinate for the OLE object

parameters.name: ZPos
parameters.description: z coordinate for the OLE object

title: IModelDocExtension.InsertObjectFromFile
description: Inserts an OLE object from a file.
signature:
SwOLEObject InsertObjectFromFile( 
   System.String
FilePath
,
   System.Boolean
CreateLink
,
   System.Int32
Aspect
,
   System.Double
XPos
,
   System.Double
YPos
,
   System.Double
ZPos
)

parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Path and filename for the OLE object file

parameters.name: CreateLink
parameters.description: True to create an external link to the OLE object file, false to embed the OLE object on the document

parameters.name: Aspect
parameters.description: Viewing aspect of the object as defined in the DVASPECT enumeration (see Remarks )

parameters.name: XPos
parameters.description: x coordinate for the OLE object

parameters.name: YPos
parameters.description: y coordinate for the OLE object

parameters.name: ZPos
parameters.description: z coordinate for the OLE object

remarks:
Currently, only the drawing documents use the x,y,z coordinate position. Part and assembly documents place the inserted object at the upper-right corner of the model view.
The aspect argument uses the DVASPECT enumeration, which has the following values:
DVASPECT_CONTENT = 1
DVASPECT_THUMBNAIL = 2
DVASPECT_ICON = 4
DVASPECT_DOCPRINT = 8
See the MSDN documentation for additional details about the DVASPECT enumeration.
